mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into classification (name, create_at, description, creator, visible) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visible,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update classification set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, visible = #{visible,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, create_at, description, creator, visible from classification
